page.title: 05SOCIAL LIFE _ WOMEN.
page.content: Many organisations exist in the community. There is a Women's Guild attached to the church whose purpose is to raise money for local needs and the wider work of the church including their overseas missions: to interest themselves in matters relating to the church and to deepen their knowledge and understanding of Christian teaching. The Scottish Women's Rural Institute have a branch here. It's aim is to encourage it's members in the skills of baking,sewing and other home crafts.In the spring they hold a bulb,baking and craft show when prizes are given for the best exhibit. Their advice is often sought on matters concerning the home. There is an active parent's group in the school and a Mother's/toddlers group meet there weekly.
